ygData.subject: Re: Crash Course
ygData.msgSnippet: As the heat of re-entry causes the temperature inside to skyrocket, the pilot unstraps himself and attempts to open the canopy hatch.  No dice, it s jammed.

As the heat of re-entry causes the temperature inside to skyrocket, 
the pilot unstraps himself and attempts to open the canopy hatch.  No 
dice, it's jammed.  "Oh well," he grumbles, grabbing the emergency 
survival kit and stuffing it into the subspace compartment in his 
chest.  "Better this hunk of junk than me!"  Looking up, he targets 
his twin shoulder turrets on the transparisteel panel above him and 
fires a pair of laser beams, shattering the canopy.

"Geronimoooooooooooo!" he yells as he leaps from his burning shuttle 
and ignites his rocketpack.  The castaway gets clear just second 
before the ship's fuel supply ignites and detonates.  "Whew!  Made 
it!"  He spoke too soon, however, for as he descends into the lower 
troposphere, a piece of half-molten metal from his craft strikes his 
rocketpack and burns a hole in it, sending him careening out of 
control.

"YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!!"

...
